attributes.review: This app took DAYS to download. Once I opened the app I heard a knock on my door and it was a bunch of ummpa loompas they went inside and had a bunch of bags that were filled with flying Cheetos and once they opened the bags the Cheetos were flying around my house chanting “Trump For 2020”. After that I deleted the app but then I realized that the app deleted EVERYTHING. My photos, videos, my data EVERYTHING. Don’t get this app and DO NOT support this Cheeto (aka Donald Trump). Or else all of these horrible events and much more will happen to YOU!!! Stay safe from sexist, homophobic and racist Cheetos everyone!!!!🧚✨
